content: Investments Asked by Gabriel ThamAsked on 07 Feb 2019Do you need to pay withholding tax on US options premiums?Do you need to pay withholding tax on US options premiums?1 answerAnswerBump1

Jonathan Chia Guangrong, Fund Manager at JCG FundLevel 6. MasterAnswered on 07 Feb 2019Withholding is only on dividends. Premiums collected from selling options are tax free 0 comments0
